Title: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Sport
Writer: Satoshi Tajiri (creator), Takeshi Shudo, Norman J. Grossfeld (adaptation), Michael Haigney (adaptation), John Touhey (adaptation), Takeshi Shudo
Actors: Veronica Taylor, Jay Goede, Rachael Lillis, Eric Stuart
Plot: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.
